if jobcat1 = 3 or jobcat5 = 16 or jobcat9 = 18
1 ANIM_aPES_RADIO_3_1 - In the last twelve months, did you come in contact with herbicides, insecticides, fungicides, rodenticides, or fumigants?
1A1 ANIM_aPES_RADIO_3_1A1 - In the last working week, did you mix, load or apply any herbicides, weed killers or insecticides?
1A1A1 ANIM_aPES_RADIO_3_1A1A1 - In the last working week, did you mix herbicides, weed killers or insecticides with petrol?
1A1A2 ANIM_aPES_RADIO_3_1A1A2 - In the last working week, did you use herbicides or insecticides containing ethylene oxide?
1A1A3 ANIM_aPES_CHECK_3_1A1A3 - Where did you mix, load or apply any herbicides, weed killers or insecticides in the last working week?
1A1A3A1 ANIM_aPES_CHECK_3_1A1A3A1 - How was the area ventilated?
aPES_1A1A3A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aPES_1A1A3A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aPES_1A1A3A1C By a general ventilation system (3)
aPES_1A1A3A1D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aPES_1A1A3A1E By open doors or windows (5)
aPES_1A1A3A1F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
1A1A4 ANIM_aPES_RADIO_3_1A1A4 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection while mixing, loading or applying herbicides or insecticides?
1A1A4A1 ANIM_aPES_CHECK_3_1A1A4A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?
aPES_1A1A4A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge (1)
aPES_1A1A4A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) (3)
aPES_1A1A4A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP) (4)
1A1A5 ANIM_aPES_RADIO_3_1A1A5 - In the last working week, what clothing did you wear when mixing or applying herbicides or insecticides?
aPES_1A1A5F Shirts or t-shirts with sleeves (6)
1A2 ANIM_aPES_RADIO_3_1A2 - In the last working week, did you apply fumigants to kill pests on stored crops?
1A2A1 ANIM_aPES_CHECK_3_1A2A1 - What fumigants did you apply or mix in the last working week?
1A2A2 ANIM_aPES_RADIO_3_1A2A2 - In the last working week, did you enter the area during fumigation and/or before the area was declared safe?
1A2A2A1 ANIM_aPES_RADIO_3_1A2A2A1 - Were you wearing an air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) when you entered the area?
1A2A3 ANIM_aPES_RADIO_3_1A2A3 - In the last working week, was the fumigation area always sealed from other areas?

1 ANIM_aFPE_RADIO_4_1 - In the last working week, did you use or repair any fuel-powered equipment other than vehicles or generators (e.g., concrete cutter, metal cutter, truck mount, chainsaws, lawnmowers, concrete mixer, brush cutter)?

1 ANIM_aDVM_RADIO_6_1 - In the last working week, did you drive, maintain, or travel in vehicles as part of your work?
1A1 ANIM_aDVM_CHECK_6_1A1 - What types of fuel did the vehicles that you drove, maintained or travelled in use?
aDVM_1A1C Liquified Petroleum Gas (LPG) or propane (3)
1A2 ANIM_aDVM_RADIO_6_1A2 - In the last working week, did you fuel the vehicles yourself?

1A3A1 ANIM_aDVM_CHECK_6_1A3A1 - What types of roads or areas did you drive or travel on?
aDVM_1A3A1A Any public street or road in an urban area (1)
aDVM_1A3A1B National, regional, district or municipal roads outside an urban area (including motorways) (2)
aDVM_1A3A1F Surface driving in an open mine or in a quarry (6)

1A4A1 ANIM_aDVM_RADIO_6_1A4A1 - In the last working week, did you do tune ups, exhaust pipe work, or engine overhauls on the vehicles?
1A4A1A1 ANIM_aDVM_RADIO_6_1A4A1A1 - In the last working week, did you attach a hose to the exhaust pipe of the vehicle you maintained to lead the exhaust fumes outside?

1A4A2A1 ANIM_aDVM_RADIO_6_1A4A2A1 - In the last working week, did you service/repair/replace brakes or clutches on vehicles older than [DE: 2005, FI: 1993; FR: 1997; IE: 2000; ES: 2002 ; HU: 2005]?
1A4A4 ANIM_aDVM_RADIO_6_1A4A4 - In the last working week, did you drain fuel tanks or change fuel filters?
1A4A5 ANIM_aDVM_CHECK_6_1A4A5 - In the last working week, did you work indoors or outdoors?
1A4A5A1 ANIM_aDVM_CHECK_6_1A4A5A1 - How was the area where you carried out vehicle maintenance ventilated?
aDVM_1A4A5A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aDVM_1A4A5A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aDVM_1A4A5A1C By a general ventilation system (3)
aDVM_1A4A5A1D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aDVM_1A4A5A1E By open doors or windows (5)
aDVM_1A4A5A1F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
